title: Complete Guide to Creating an Angie's List Business Profile for Service Providers
description: Learn how to set up and optimize your Angie's List business profile to attract high-quality leads and build trust with homeowners seeking professional services.

seo.title: Angie's List Business Profile Setup Guide 2024 | Get More Service Leads
seo.description: Master Angie's List business profile creation with our comprehensive guide. Attract quality leads, build trust, and grow your service business.

sections.title: Create Your Angie's List Business Account
sections.content:
Visit angi.com/business-center and click 'Join as a Pro'. Angie's List has rebranded to Angi but maintains the same quality standards for service providers.

Complete the initial registration with your business information including legal business name, address, phone number, and primary service categories. You'll need to verify your business license and insurance during the application process.

Important: Angie's List has a screening process for service providers. Be prepared to provide documentation proving your business legitimacy, insurance coverage, and professional credentials.
tips: Have your business license and insurance certificates ready before starting
Use your legal business name exactly as it appears on official documents
Ensure your phone number can receive calls during business hours

sections.title: Complete Your Professional Profile
sections.content:
Fill out every section of your business profile thoroughly:

  • Business Description: Write a compelling 500-word description highlighting your experience, specialties, and what sets you apart from competitors.
  • Service Areas: Define your geographic coverage area precisely. Be realistic about travel distances and service capabilities.
  • Services Offered: List all services you provide with detailed descriptions. Use specific terminology that homeowners search for.
  • Licensing & Insurance: Upload current certificates and maintain updated documentation.
  • Business Hours: Set accurate availability including emergency service hours if applicable.

Angie's List profiles with complete information receive 3x more leads than incomplete profiles.
tips: Use keywords homeowners search for when describing your services
Include specific brand names and materials you work with
Update your availability regularly, especially during busy seasons

sections.title: Build an Impressive Photo Portfolio
sections.content:
Visual proof of your work quality is crucial on Angie's List. Upload high-quality photos showcasing:

Before and After Photos:

  • Document transformation projects clearly
  • Use consistent lighting and angles
  • Include close-up detail shots
  • Show the full scope of completed projects

Work in Progress Photos:

  • Demonstrate your professional process
  • Show attention to detail and cleanliness
  • Highlight quality materials and tools

Team and Equipment Photos:

  • Professional headshots of key team members
  • Clean, well-maintained equipment
  • Uniformed staff at work sites

Aim for at least 20-30 high-quality photos across different project types.
tips: Take photos in natural lighting when possible
Include a variety of project sizes and types
Update your portfolio regularly with recent work

sections.title: Set Competitive and Transparent Pricing
sections.content:
Angie's List customers value transparency in pricing. Develop a clear pricing strategy:

Service Pricing:

  • Provide detailed estimates for common services
  • Break down costs by materials and labor
  • Offer multiple service tiers (good, better, best)
  • Include warranty information in pricing

Pricing Transparency:

  • Explain what's included in base pricing
  • List potential additional costs upfront
  • Provide free estimates when possible
  • Honor quoted prices for reasonable timeframes

Competitive Analysis: Research competitor pricing on Angie's List to position yourself competitively while maintaining profitability.
tips: Bundle related services for better value perception
Offer seasonal promotions to attract new customers
Be upfront about minimum service charges

sections.title: Optimize Lead Response and Management
sections.content:
Quick response times are critical on Angie's List. Homeowners often contact multiple providers, so speed matters:

Response Time Goals:

  • Respond to leads within 15 minutes during business hours
  • Set up automatic email responses for after-hours inquiries
  • Use the Angie's List mobile app for instant notifications
  • Call leads directly rather than just emailing

Lead Qualification:

  • Ask specific questions about project scope and timeline
  • Confirm budget expectations early in conversations
  • Schedule in-person consultations for qualified leads
  • Follow up consistently with interested prospects

Conversion Strategies: Provide detailed estimates, offer multiple options, and emphasize your Angie's List credentials and reviews.
tips: Create templates for common lead response scenarios
Track lead sources and conversion rates
Follow up with leads who don't respond immediately

sections.title: Build and Maintain Excellent Reviews
sections.content:
Reviews are the foundation of success on Angie's List. Develop a systematic approach to earning positive reviews:

Earning Reviews:

  • Deliver exceptional service that exceeds expectations
  • Follow up after project completion to ensure satisfaction
  • Politely ask satisfied customers to leave reviews
  • Provide easy instructions for leaving reviews

Review Response Strategy:

  • Respond to all reviews, both positive and negative
  • Thank customers for positive feedback specifically
  • Address negative reviews professionally and offer solutions
  • Use reviews as opportunities to showcase your customer service

Review Monitoring: Check your reviews regularly and address any issues promptly. Angie's List customers heavily rely on reviews when making hiring decisions.
tips: Send follow-up emails 1-2 weeks after project completion
Include review request cards with final invoices
Respond to negative reviews within 24 hours
